name: NYCRentCalculator
description: NYC Rent-Stabilized Apartment Lease Renewal Calculator

scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production browserify src/index.jsx -o app/build/bundle.js -t babelify -t envify -g uglifyify
scripts.start: npm run watch & npm run serve
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch src -e js,jsx --exec "browserify src/index.jsx -o app/build/bundle.js -d -v -t babelify"

author: ghostwords
